verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe,--nā bujhi', hena jñāna yāra
bujhibāra lāgi' seha puche punarbāra

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya kahe—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied; nā bujhi'-not understanding; hena—this; jñāna—the knowledge; yāra—of someone; bujhibāra lāgi'-just to understand; seha—he also; puche—inquires; punaḥ-bāra—again.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied, "I accept that You do not understand, yet even one who does not understand inquires about the subject matter.
